oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Steve Leslie - 2004-06-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances by songwriters Steve Leslie and Brittany Pittard from the Ford Theatre at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 19, 2004.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Steve Leslie; Brittany Pittard;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Includes questions from audience. Let It Rain (Steve Leslie) -- That's The Truth (Steve Leslie) -- Introduction of Brittany Pittard -- I Miss That Man (Brittany Pittard) -- Next Time You See Me I'll Be Gone (Brittany Pittard) -- Second Wind (Steve Leslie) -- Somewhere Over You (Brittany Pittard) -- Simple Act Of Kindness (Steve Leslie) --
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Leslie, Steve; Pittard, Brittany; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
